Header: KDU Vice Chancellor & Commander Share Cordial Views
Content: Air Vice Marshal H.M.S.K.B Kotakadeniya, Vice Chancellor at Kotelawala Defence University (KDU) paid a courtesy call on the Commander of the Army Lieutenant General Shavendra Silva on Friday (4) at his office in the Army Headquarters. During this discussion, both of them shared views on general matters of training with special focus on KDU degree courses and modules, related to military career, etc. The visiting VC also extended his best wishes on the new office of Lieutenant General Silva. At the end of the interaction, both of them exchanged  mementos as symbols of goodwill.
